Key Match Events: Youri Tielemans scored a goal from the edge of the area in the second minute
Kevin De Bruyne scored a goal in the 80th minute after converting direct from Belgium goalkeeper Koen Casteels' long kick
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium's win was crucial after the shock of losing to Slovakia in their opening game
There is all to play for in the final round of games on Wednesday as all four teams in Group E have three points
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played in Cologne Stadium, Cologne, Germany
The format of the Euros, in which the four best third-place teams advance, leaves more room for error
Others: The game was officiated by referee Daniele Orsato
Belgium's goalkeeper Florin Nita denied a goal opportunity for Romania's Dennis Man
